pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Shoes plus socks; Chemical-resistant gloves; Safety glasses or goggles

Safety_Information.general_Info: For general information on product use, etc., call the National Pesticides Information Center at 1-800-858-7378. For emergencies, call the poison control center 1-800-222-1222.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes; Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye; Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice; Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow; Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by the poison control center or doctor; Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air; If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably by mouth-to-mouth, if possible; Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing; Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes; Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.

Application_Info.application_Method: Enclosed space treatment using SmartFresh ProTabs and ProPack
Enclosed space treatment using SmartFresh ProTabs and ProPack
